title: Time Prisoner
overview: In 2060, in order to solve various supernatural crises, the World Organization selected elite agents from around the world to form a crisis bureau. The Dangerous Situation selected the elites among the elites to form an ace squad, named the Phantom. Our protagonist has lived as a fugitive. Haoyuan didn't want to face the past. He chose to remain anonymous and lead a plain life, guarding Gu Xiaoxi, the sister of his comrade-in-arms. But God's will make people, a blue virus appeared in Y City, the infected person's skin appeared blue texture, and then spread all over the body little by little, and finally died. And Gu Xiaoxi was also infected. In order to break the blue virus incident and save Gu Xiaoxi, Hyway returns to the crisis situation. With the sexy and capable agent Yu Jie-Xia Rou, the quirky genius Loli-Tong Xiaoxiao, and the second big gangster-Zhan Peng and other weird guys make a makeshift to form an alternative Phantom squad. And our legendary story begins here.
